name: Warner Hill Angels
overview:
Warner Hill Angels is a venture capital firm interested in an eclectic group of industries. Accredited investors borrow from Peter Thiel’s theory behind 20 Under 20 and rely on some of the country’s best and brightest young people to help find successful investments. These 16-20 year olds help Warner Hill’s investors navigate thru the latest start-ups to find what tech savvy users really like. Together the accredited investors and the wunderkind teenagers make a winning team that appeals to today’s entrepreneurs that need funding but love having energetic, bright young people to help fuel their start-ups with fresh feedback and ideas.

Warner Hill Angels looks at investments in spaces including education, social media, payments, social funding, design and communication. The right person is more important than the right idea.
